item.title: How to find it
item.description: The #1 thing on my list of stuff-someone-really-ought-to-have-already-told-you: Most books and scientific papers can be downloaded from gen.

item.title: Lies you were taught
item.description: Wikipedia maintains a list of common misconceptions, some of which you likely hold.
